whole_object: At the newest cafe, the dress code is strictly 'pot' couture, where everyone carries their own pot on the head to blend in!
single_object:
- Pots: These pots must be the latest in high-fashion headwear – they really are 'topping' the style charts!
- Purple dresses: These purple dresses aren't just violet delights, they must be the 'purple'-fect attire for a sophisticated squat!
multi_object:
- Pots  
- Purple dresses  
- These pots are really trying to dress up their game, but they just can't seem to find the right purple to match!  

- Purple dresses  
- Pots  
- These purple dresses are so vibrant, even the pots are jealous of their ability to steal the spotlight!
